Interface MarshallerContext


  • public interface MarshallerContext
    Marshaller context.

      Class getClass(int id, ClassLoader ldr)
      Gets class for provided type ID.

    • Method Detail

      • registerClass

        boolean registerClass(int id,
                    Class cls)
                      throws IgniteCheckedException
        Registers class with provided type ID.
        Parameters:
        id - Type ID.
        cls - Class.
        Returns:
        Whether class was registered.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - In case of error.

      • getClass

        Class getClass(int id,
             ClassLoader ldr)
               throws ClassNotFoundException,
                      IgniteCheckedException
        Gets class for provided type ID.
        Parameters:
        id - Type ID.
        ldr - Class loader.
        Returns:
        Class.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If class was not found.
        IgniteCheckedException - In case of any other error.

      • isSystemType

        boolean isSystemType(String typeName)
        Checks whether the given type is a system one - JDK class or Ignite class.
        Parameters:
        typeName - Type name.
        Returns:
        true if the type is a system one, false otherwise.
